Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: candice sharpe
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product for my 8 year old son and my 7 year old daughter.  It works perfectly and my husband and I even use it for many different things.

Reviews.Title: very bad
Reviews.Author: Ekrem OZLU
Reviews.Content: it is very slow. sometimes it is not working , and it can not open any wideo, also it can not open youtube wideo. it is very bad.that was my first order but i dont want to give another order.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: daniel
Reviews.Content: shipping was good. im very pleased with the product it runs a little bit clunky but for the price you cant find a better tablet

Reviews.Title: Sucks bad
Reviews.Author: John Hardman
Reviews.Content: I bought three and two of them the chargers fell apart within a week, one tablet flickers and does not come on right away and all 3 are very slow.

Reviews.Title: Nicole
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: It's fast it's easy it's durable I live it an it's perfect for a gift for a child for all the games and things try want on it!!! It's great!!!

Reviews.Title: Good item for kids and grown-ups .
Reviews.Author: ALBERT B.YRIE
Reviews.Content: Nice cheap tablet.not bad for kids.I love the interface.my son like to play with just the aquarium and watch the fish swim by.

Reviews.Title: Good so far for price
Reviews.Author: Christopher Stapleton
Reviews.Content: This tablet was extremely inexpensive,  The quality seems to be far beyond another budget tablet I own.  The tablet preforms everything acceptably well.  I am satisfied with it so far.  As long as you understand you are not going to get iPad speed and performance for the price, you will be happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Negative stars weren't an option but one star is too generous of a rating
Reviews.Author: stephanie
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my daughter's birthday and have had nothing but issues since I got it. Two weeks after receiving it the charging dock came loose and wouldn't charge anymore. Then I sent it back for a replacement, FINALLY got a new one almost a month later and after being on it for 20 minutes it shut itself down and won't reboot. They won't give me my money back because it's been more than 30 days-they want me to send it back for repair. Ridiculous. I will never buy anything from this company again.

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas gifts!
Reviews.Author: Tuesday Aziz
Reviews.Content: I purchased these for my nieces and nephews. They were really easy to set up. The only thing that I was disappointed about was the front facing camera. People love taking pictures, why would you not put a rear facing camera on a tablet!

Reviews.Title: Súper!!!
Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: Excelent tablet for my kid!!! My kid Like this tablet.... Amazing!!! Súper!!! Educational applications. Excelent. Súper. Extraordinary. Espectacular. Súper súper

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Debra
Reviews.Content: My father in law loved it. He takes it every where and uses it from home to the hospital and then some.

Reviews.Title: After paying for two tablets the sellers sent me 2 wireless chargers.
Reviews.Author: mercedes loveyooeyes
Reviews.Content: I am not pleased. This is a total inconvenience. I would the tablets which I purchased. I would not recommend anyone to deal with this seller.

Reviews.Title: Will order another one soon
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for my daughter for Christmas. Didn't expect this to be shipped so quick. So far so good I like it. Was charged when I got it. Haven't been on it yet but have turned it on pushing buttons just to make sure it works properly satisfies so far.

Reviews.Title: DIDN'T GET ON TIME IMPORTANT CHRISTMAS PRESENT!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Erica Lassie
Reviews.Content: Said it would be here by Christmas but did not. What a waist of money. Now got to go find some somewhere else on a Christmas Eve at 9pm. Good Luck to me!!!!!!!!!!
